numerical module¶

numerical.check_significant_np(data, thresh)¶

Checks if a coloum a given array is below a given threshhold and gives out a

numerical.do_dft(data, time)¶
numerical.do_dft_real(data, tmax)¶

Calculates the direct fouriertransformation of a given data and the frequencies of a given time Args:

data: a real-valued numpy array tmax: a numpy array which discribes the time, has to have same length as data file

Returns: an array with direct fourier transformed data and an array containing the sample frequencies

numerical.drop_column(data, n)¶

Selects a certain column of an array and stores the column in a vector data: array with data n: number of the column which should be stored in a vector

numerical.make_complex(data)¶
numerical.plot_and_save_function(time, data)¶

Plots a given dataframes with time on the x-axis and data on the y-axis and saves it data: array with the same length as the time array time: array with same lenght as the data array

numerical.read_in_np(filedir, filename)¶

Reads in a .csv-type File to a Dataframe Args: filedir([String]): Directionary where the file is located filename([String]): File which contains Dataframe

Returns: Dataframe: Data from file as a numpy array
